messages.subject: I WANT TO HELP CHANGE YOUR LIFE
messages.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,







Thanks for your mail. Good day to you and yours. Please read carefully and think hard before you pass this offer up..







I am a news story production manager for a small subsidiary of CBS News America and am currently looking for a very unusual and unorthodox story about a 419 person. Please do not be offended as I am not here to judge you. In fact my intentions are the complete opposite. I have attached a leaked news paper story for you to read.







If all goes well we are prepared to pay you $50, 000 USD with more to come. Your privacy and identity will be well protected at all times.







I have compiled a list of people in your business from a reputable source and  I am deadly serious about this and promise to do my utmost to see you get all you deserve and to help you out of any trouble or pain you may be in if you decide to help us bring your side of the story to light.







Basically the story we want to do is about a 419 person. We want you to do a video documentary or diary if you will of the average 419 person's daily routine and provide written material and information. What he does, where he goes, who he talks to, when he prays, where he buys his toilet roll and so on. You will need to include visuals of where you live, where you work from and include interviews with yourself to the camera about how the business works and anything you feel is worthy for the documentary footage. For quickness and ease of production on our part you will need to film your diary on a web cam or digital video camera or digital mobile phone device which can be easily uploaded onto a P.C and the footage sent to us via email.







BUT PLEASE REALISE OUR MAIN AIM..We want you to show the human side of your life, your hardship, your pain, the reasons you have to do such work and so on. We will keep your identity secret and will not involve law enforcement. We really feel your side of the story needs to be told.







I recently did an interview with a scamming person from Ghana who had been arrested in New York and I was touched by his genuine sorrow and pain of his life. This is the driving force behind our idea and why my team and I have decided to seek a person to help us bring this story to light. It could be you. I hope you want it to be but as you see I have emailed a lot of scammers offering them the same deal. I have done so to increase my chances of finding someone genuinely interested in having his story told. I must stress the need for secrecy in this as I do not want any of my rival T.V stations copying our story.







READ THIS NEXT PART CAREFULLY TO AVOID SILLY REPLIES







Please do not ask us to forward you money or any equipment as WE WILL NOT .







If you are interested in my proposal please get back to me and I will happily answer any questions. Thank you for reading and may God be with you.



--



R.S.V.P







Treeza Green







Story Production Manager







F.U.L.A.D.S News

messages.subject: Re: YOU CAN REACH ME ON THIS ADDRESS
messages.body:
Hello Mr Momoh,







I must say your letter is one of the more polite and well thought out we have recieved. We have not had much success in our endeavour to bring this documentary to it's conclusion. The final piece is all we need and I'm hoping you have the courage and conviction to help us.







Ofcourse if it is only about money for you then that is fine. We have no problem with that and remember your identity which is anonymous as we speak shall stay as such throughout this escapade.







So like most men in your business you have demanded phone only contact. This reason is beyond me but I must tell you the people we've rung up to this point and phone conversations we've had have been very fruitless. The connection is always very poor and African men seem to talk extremely fast. For this reason we have set up a yahoo account to have lengthy conversation and discussions free of charge and bad phone connections.







You can contact my secretary or Assistant anytime on these addies, Joanna Punch and Walter Jablonski there is always someone there if you need reassuring. You may also send me a number to contact you on and I will do my best to ring you and show you we are for real and loaded as I'm sure that is the only reason you want to talk on the phone.



--



R.S.V.P







Treeza Green







Story Production Manager







F.U.L.A.D.S News

HELLO TREEZA,







LET ME FIRST APPRECIATE YOUR COMPLIMENTS. THANK YOU SO MUCH.







MY DEAR FRIEND, I AM AN AFRICAN BUT AN EXPOSED ONE AT THAT, I HAVE A WESTERN ORIENTATION, MY FIRST CHILD IS BY AN AMERICAN FROM PHILADELPHIA. I TELL YOU THIS BECAUSE I WANT YOU TO KNOW THAT I AM VERY EXPOSED MAN THAT CAN SPEAK ENGLISH TO THE LETTER.







HOWEVER, I WILL GIVE YOU A NUMBER TO REACH ME, BUT YOU MUST AGREE WITH ME THAT THE TASK YOU REQUIRE FROM ME IS NOT AS EASY AS YOU WANT IT, LIKE I SAID EARLIER, I CAN PROVIDE YOU WITH ALL THAT YOU NEED BUT I NEED A MORE PERSONAL BUSINESS RELATIONSHIP WITH YOU, YOU HAVE TO SHOW SOME KIND OF SERIOUSNESS. I WILL BE PUTTING MY LIFE AND MY FAMILYS LIFE IN ABSOLUT DANGER, SO I NEED A MORE SERIOUS THING WITH YOU.







WELL, I WILL NOT TALK SO MUCH BECAUSE I KNOW WHAT I HAVE TO GIVE BUT NOT AT THE EXPENSE OF DEAR LIFE OF LOVED ONES. COME ON TREEZA, YOU KNOW WHAT I AM TALKING ABOUT, THIS IS MY LIFE WE ARE TALKING ABOUT. NIGERIA IS THE SEAT OF SCAM, I HAVE THE FULL DETAILS. I WILL NEED A PRIVATE RECORDING FACILITY THAT WILL NOT BE SUSPETED, I NEED TO GET MY OWN LAPTOP AND SOME VERY PERSONAL THINGS, I CANNOT DO ALL THIS JUST BECAUSE WE TALKED ON EMAIL. LET US GET SERIOUS AND I WILL OPEN UP.







I HAVE MADE ATTEMPT TO GET ACROSS TO JEFF KOINANGE WHEN HE CAME TO NIGERIA, BUT BEFORE I GOT BACK FROM UGANDA, HE WAS GONE. LISTEN TREEZA, I NEED YOU TO SHOW MORE SERIOUSNESS.







I WILL SEND YOU MY NUMBER IN A FEW MINUTES

messages.subject: Re: YOU CAN REACH ME ON THIS ADDRESS
messages.body:
Hello Mr Momoh,







I understand your situation and believe it when I say we know this is a big risk for you. For this reason we are offering you so much money. The footage you will provide is a very important piece to the completion of our documentary.







I am more than willing to take you serious and not judge you in any way. You seem like your heart is in the right place and if you provide us with the footage we have discussed there will be no problem whatsoever in paying you your funds.







What you must understand is if you ask for money before we see the footage you will not receive any and I will lose my faith in you. Asking for money before we see your footage only proves you are trying to scam us. I have the same thing happen hundreds of times and frankly I go weary of it. So much so my boss almost pulled the plug on the whole project.







You can film yourself on a web cam detailing all your knowledge or use a cheap digital video camera to this. You do not need a professional studio. However if you wish to use one by all means do so. Know that we will not send you money to pay for it.







Ypu seem to be an educated man with his priorities right and I hope you want to do this gor the good of your family. It would give me great pleasure to know the funds for your footage are going to do some good for a family and not squandered on drugs and women and cars.







I await your number and response. Also one of my team members Mr Jablonksi has added you to the yahoo addy if you wish to speak with him. Thanks very much for all your efforts thus far.



--



R.S.V.P







Treeza Green







Story Production Manager







F.U.L.A.D.S News

Hello Mr Momoh,







Thanks for another comprehensive mail. I know you haven't asked for money and if you had I wouldn't have replied to you.







I am a mere reporter Sir. I am part of a team that is trying to create a documentary about the situation in Nigeria and the reasons people in your business do what they do. I will not make money from this. I will simply collect my weekly wages as per normalLY usual. The company may profit from it however but it is they who are willing to pay you this substantial sum for the footage you are willing to provide.







Having said that I wish to ask you to be as safe as possible. Your life and that of your families is paramount. If this can damage either then I must ask you not to do it.







Take all the time you need and plan what you will include in the footage for us. Everyone here agrees with me that you are the man to bring this project full swing and we thank you for that. I will ofcourse call you as soon as I get a quiet moment. Is there a particular time you would prefer to be called??







Do not forget to contact the yahoo addy I gave you on yahoo chat also. If not me one of the team will be there to speak with you.



--



R.S.V.P

Story Production Manager







F.U.L.A.D.S News

messages.subject: Re: THIS IS IMPORTNT
messages.body:
Hi,







1) WHAT ARE THE LEGAL IMPLICATIONS - There aren't any. Nothing is known about you and from the start we wanted to that for your safety and peace of mind. 419 is illegal so I don't see how making a diary about it is illegal. Besides we hired you and you did the job so how is that illegal?







2) IS MY RECORDING RIGHT AND WITHOUT COMPLAINT OF EXCUSES - What you said you've done is exactly what we asked for, I only asked you to add extra visuals if it was safe for you. It is no problem,







3) WHAT WILL THE AFTER STORY LOOK LIKE ON AIR - We'll be blurring your face to add seriousness and name you Mr X for dramatic effect. We will say you volunteered to get the info out of your country to show the world. It's all about tugging on heart strings. Paying you won't be mentioned. I'll send you a copy.







WILL MY MONEY BE DELAYED FOR ANY REASON AND PLEASE STATE THE LIKELY REASONS. I can't see any reason as we've been waiting for so long I'm positive you will be paid. My bosses aren't crooks and they know the risk you have taken and kind of admire you. So you can sleep well in the knowledge the money is your's.







Let me know when you post it as I need to have an idea of the timing. You've done your part now our work starts. Take care.



--



R.S.V.P







Treeza Green







Story Production Manager







F.U.L.A.D.S News
